comments.title: Nice product at the listed price
comments.description: Dove has always been known for it bring gentle and mild. And so is its damage repair therapy shampoo. I have been using it for so e time now and I have seen good results so far. My hair tangles less after wash and it makes my hair softer and less frizzy. As far as fragrance is concerned, it does has a fragrance which I found to be pleasant but may be those who want a fragrance free product might not like it. It claims to be sulphate free and does not contain dye, it also claims to be cruelty free and recycles 25% of plastic while packaging, a of which is a plus point if the claims are true. Talking about the packaging, It comes in a pump like bottle which is easy to use and avoids spillage of the product. All on all I found it to be a decent product at a very decent price.

comments.description: So I've been using this toothbrush for over 2 weeks now. So far I'm really satisfied with this product. The build quality is pretty good. It doesn't feel like cheap plastic. The timer functionality is really useful because it ensures you only brush for 2min and not more or less. I haven't tried all the modes, just the 1st three modes but I can definitely tell the difference between the three so it doesn't feel like a gimmick. The only con I have with this toothbrush is that for charging it still uses micro usb which is pretty outdated now that we're moving to type-c everything. But given the battery would last for 20 days you wouldn't have to carry any extra charging cable for a short trip. So overall this is a really good electric toothbrush.

comments.title: Excellent electric toothbrush
comments.design: Style name: Caresmith SPARK Rechargeable Electric Toothbrush (White)
comments.description: After years of living with issues associated with overcrowded teeth, my new dentist recommended electric toothbrush. I wanted to try one and didn't want to spend too much just in case I didn't want to use it long term. I researched and opted for this as the price was quite reasonable compared to other brands. It has been over a year and I have been quite satisfied with the performance. No more bad breath, swollen gums and no more dentist visits. I am facing some issue with the brush after more than a year of usage. I wa thinking probably I would have to throw it away like all other electronic items. But then I read some reviews and reached out to support through their website and there was an immediate response. Shared video of the issue on WhatsApp support number provided through email and again very prompt response. Amazing support and service. Overall very happy with the product at this price range and the support responsiveness.

comments.title: Won't blow your mind
comments.description: Sound quality is very muffled, and feels cheap. My other wired headphones which costed 500/- sound better. These headphones can get louder but aren't pleasant to ears. The buttons are very flat and difficult to navigate while using the headphones. The ear pads rotate inwards but you can't tell which way to rotate because there's no marking, maybe that's why many people broke it. Other than that, bluetooth reception is good and so is the call quality. The power on and off voice is annoying after some time, simple bloop would've worked. But since I've got these for 699/- I guess I shouldn't be complaining much. All in all okeyish bluetooth headphones for the price
